metadata.title: CVE-2024-49393 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In neomutt and mutt, the To and Cc email headers are not validated bycryptographic signing which allows an attacker that intercepts a message tochange their value and include himself as a one of the recipients tocompromise message confidentiality.

criterions.comment: mutt package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
neomutt package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
